name: FreeGameChecker
author: Subestro
short: A Discord bot that checks for free games and sends notifications.
installed_msg: Thank you for installing the FreeGameChecker bot! Use the 'fg' command to enable free games notifications.

commands.name: fg
commands.description: Enable free games notifications for the specified channel.

commands.name: tfg
commands.description: Test whether free games notifications are enabled and working.
